# Shifa2u (Al-Shifa Home Health Care) - LLM Context

This file provides essential context about the Shifa2u website to assist Large Language Models in understanding the project structure, purpose, and technology stack.

## Project Overview
- **Project Name:** Shifa2u (Al-Shifa Home Health Care Agency)
- **Description:** A Next.js web application for a home health care agency serving multiple counties in California. Services include post-surgical rehabilitation, skilled nursing, physical therapy, cupping therapy, and more.
- **URL:** https://shifa2u.com

## Tech Stack
- **Framework:** Next.js 15+ (App Router)
- **Language:** TypeScript 
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS v4, custom utility classes
- **UI Components & Animations:** Framer Motion, @headlessui/react
- **Icons:** Lucide React, Heroicons
- **Media Management:** Cloudinary
- **Forms & Email:** Nodemailer, React Google reCAPTCHA, React Hot Toast
- **Analytics:** Google Tag Manager

## Key Directories
- `src/app`: Contains Next.js App Router pages and layouts.
- `src/components`: Reusable UI components (e.g., Header, Footer, ServiceCard).
- `public`: Static assets (HTML verifications, robots.txt, older local media not yet on Cloudinary).
- `scripts`: Utility or deployment scripts.

## Core Pages and Routing
- `/` - Home page (`src/app/page.tsx`)
- `/about` - About Us
- `/services` - Main Services page with various subpages for specific treatments (e.g., Physical Therapy, Cupping Therapy).
- `/contact` - Contact Us form
- `/careers` - Career opportunities and applications
- `/free-assessment` - Free Assessment form for potential patients
- `/insurance-accepted` - Information on accepted insurance providers
- `/send-referrals` - Form for healthcare providers to refer patients
- `/resources` - Additional resources and informative links
- `/privacy` - Privacy Policy
- `/terms` - Terms and Conditions
- `/api` - Backend API routes (e.g., email handling)

## Important Formatting Details
- The site uses `next/font/google` for optimized font loading (Inter, Fraunces, Questrial).
- `layout.tsx` includes global metadata and the Google Tag Manager script.
- The `Header` component includes dynamic mobile menus (drawer-style) and desktop navigation.
- The project is configured with strict linting (`eslint-config-next`), TypeScript, and Prettier formatting standardizations.
